content.detailedDescription:
I walked down to my garage at around 10 and 11:00 pm on september the 25; it was a thursday night. i was putting my cat in the garage, but before i did that, i walked out to my gate and was gazing at the western sky. it was a dry, warm night, and there were stars out, and a few airplanes in the sky. there is nothing but a field where i was looking; i live in the country. as i was looking out into the field, i saw an object in the sky, a little bit above tree-height, flashing colors. it was an object that seemed to flash colors as it looked to be turning. or it looked like it might be spinning. the lights emanating from the object were different colors - pink, blue, green... pastel colors. the object was completely silent, and hovered for 10 mintues or so. i couldn't really make out the shape of this ufo. i went up to the house to get my film camera and video camera. when i came back it was gone ...I was disappointed because i had asked the ufo to stay (there) so that i could get a picture.

i took my cat into the garage, and when i came out of the garage i walked over to the shop, which is a couple of feet away; and for some reason, i looked down at the ground, looking at the bushes. all of a sudden i looked up and there it was! staring right at me. in another spot close to me and my gate. it was at tree-top height directly across from me, in front of a house, across the road. the field i was looking at, before, is right alongside the house across the road. the ufo appeared totally different now. it was circular, and of a starlike color, only a little warmer (color). it was white, though. it hovered for a minute or so while i picked up my cameras and took pictures. when i aimed my film camera, i couldn't see anything in the lens, but took the picture anyway. i got my video camera up and shot that too. after i took my photos, the object, completely silent, then started to drop down from the sky toward the ground. it was completely descending to the ground, i thought. i walked over to the gate trying to get a look at it going down to the ground, but when i got around the gate, it was gone. it must have gone behind the house as i couldn't see it anymore. i was wondering why it had disappeared on me, but in the morning i viewed the spot again, where it had descended, and it obviously had to have gone behind the house. it had been further away than i had thought. it must have dropped behind the house and landed somewhere in a field. this is all farmland here. that is, if it landed, of course.

i took my video film inside and put it on the tv to view. to my astonishment, i did get the ufo on video! it looked like a five pointed object or something. it looked like it was spinning. then i got a white circular object and, a green circular object. funny thing, the ufo that i saw on the video looked totally different than the one i saw with the naked eye (which was a circular white object). and, the circular green object, i didn't even see! it was like there were three objects out there, and my video camera picked up three ufo's. the flashing, turning ufo, and the circular white ufo. plus, a green ufo. i thought that the flashing ufo probably traveled closer (across the field) and changed into a white circular ufo. ...But i don't know. the ufo's were one right after the other on film, so i didn't see three all at once. it could have been only one ufo changing form. who knows?



barbara richey cronin
content.summary: I saw a ufo or two ufo's on september the 25th of 2008. it was between 10:00pm and 11:00 pm. the object at first was flashing colors up in the sky. then it came close and it was a circular lighted object almost the color of a star, but a little warmer.

content.detailedDescription:
Each time i have experienced a siting i've been quietly enjoying a cigarette while seated in my backyard. i had not ingested or smoked any kind of mind altering substance. the most recent siting (approx. sept 23 2008) was a dark night, and the sky was clear of clouds and some of the brighter stars were visible as they usually are from our back-yard. three of us suddenly saw a white round ball of light (much, much larger than a star) that was totally silent moving across the north eastern sky at a steady but fast pace for about 5 seconds; then it simply disappeared about 30 degrees up from the horizon - in mid-air. it seemed to be moving from the north to the east. it was hard to determine how high it was, but it seemed to be flying at the level of jets. there were no flashing lights, no colours and no sound following behind as a jet rumble usually does. we were at a loss to find an explanation for what it was, but it was not the first time we had seen this type of object in the night sky from our back-yard.
earlier this summer (approximately mid-july) another witness and myself were sitting in my backyard and we saw basically the same large, silent white ball of light moving from the north more in a south easterly direction before it disappeared. it seemed to be moving more slowly but as steadily with no variation in direction or speed...And no accompanying sound.
during the summer of 2007 i saw the same type of white ball of light 7-8 times from the back-yard. each time they were moving in the same fashion, sometimes faster, and from west to east or south to north (sometimes straight, and sometimes in arching trajectory) disappearing in mid-air. only once did i see one continue to beyond the horizon. i was alone for about 4 of the sitings from our yard, and there had been 4 others witness the other sitings.
last summer,i also saw one following a tree-line while i was outside a cottage on the north shore of prince edward island. the silent, white ball of light was steadily moving from west to east following the tops of the trees. it seemed to be only about several hundred feet above the trees, but it did not look gigantic as one might expect if it was that close to the ground, so i was confused about where it actually was. it did not disappear, but continued until it was beyond the tree-line at the horizon.
the most memorable siting occurred last summer, approximately mid-august 2007, from my backyard. this siting occurred at around 10:00 pm. my back-yard is lined on the north and south by tall elm trees leaving a clear vantage of the s.E., east and n.E. sky. i noticed through the trees a white, silent white ball of light moving in the southern sky. i continued to watch it until it was clearly visible and beyond the trees, and a heartbeat after it cleared the trees it's size and brightness expanded with a huge flash...It took my breath away...And then it went back to it's normal size - continued steadily for 4 seconds and then disappeared in mid-air. it seemed to be moving from the south to the north in an arching fashion before it disappeared. i felt extremely excited and yelled for anyone in the house to come out. one friend came out after i ran to the door and called upstairs. he sat outside with me for about 3 minutes and the same type of white, silent ball of light became visible in the north-east sky and moved steadily toward the south for about 5 seconds and then disappeared. this was the first time he had seen anything like this and he was dumbfounded. i was extremely excited by this experience...It felt like the expansive white flash of this ball of light was exclusively directed at me. of course, my skeptical side dismissed it all as perhaps a satellite hitting the sun's rays at that moment. on the other hand, it was too big to be a satellite. i have no answers, only experiences and questions.
content.summary: From our backyard facing east we saw a bright, white, silent ball of light move from north to east but disappearing in mid-air.

content.detailedDescription: While on a freighter flight along the coast of nova scotia myself and the rest of crew saw an unidentified craft with bright lights. i am a retired pan am pilot. i reported the sighting years later to a canadian group but never heard from anyone.
content.summary: Saw large unidentified craft

content.detailedDescription: I was six years old at the time. we were in fort.Thomas ky. cutting grass my mother stopped the mower and said what is that? we looked up and very low was a silver shaped disc that made no sound and just sat there it had red yellow and white lights going around it in a circular motion. we watched it for several minutes and then it just disappeared without sound or ever able to follow it i was young and did not know of ufo's but to this day i will never forget it.
content.summary: Silver disc shape ,flashing circular lights, motionless. no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I am a keen photographer but my mainstream is macro (insects). i am also a 90/10 for believing in et phenomenon. i took a few screenshots from the video below to see if i could get an outline of some sort. as a macro photographer light is always short at high magnification and i have learned to "push" some problem photos with photoshop. i was watching this video and thought i could maybe do something similar. i took 6 screenshots from various parts of the video with a screen freeze program from the internet.

one of the frames is producing a "pixel shadow" which i cannot explain. during my macro work i have seen pixels light up when you go ott with the settings, but these are normally random throughout the image or if it is a reflection of a light source it usually flares. this one seems to me to have some organisation.

the video is off you tube and it was broadcast by fox13 news - pasco - 14th march 2008. the link is here:

http://uk.Youtube.Com/watch?V=utpayxwnmba&eurl=http://www.Directvillasflorida.Com/florida-blog/index.Php/most-convincing-ufo-sightings-in-florida/

i don't know if the video is fake, real et or a man made craft. i live in the uk and i don't know who took the video.

the only controls used in ps is brightness, contrast and shadow. the first frame that i have included is the actual screenshot so you can see where the progress slider is on the video where i froze the image. the second is the ps version. the refelection seems to give the craft direction with a back and front. maybe a pulse of some sort that has been picked up? as i have said i don't know how real or relevant this may be but i thought it was worth posting. the other 5 frames didn't seem to produce anything. anybody should be able to produce this with a photo program and the right video frame.
content.summary: Pasco triangle.

content.detailedDescription: While taking photos of the sunset over the bush at wooli, new south wales, australia, i turned towards the beach to take photos of my daughter. i took three photos in quick sucession in the second photo there is an odd sphere shape in the sky that i can not account for as it is not in the photos on either side of the middle photo and would like your opinion on what you think it is. as soon as i saw the photo i called the family over to show them what called a ufo. i have attached the three photos that where taken, it is the middle photo that may interest you.
content.summary: Took photo when put on computer odd shape in background - unexplainable.

content.detailedDescription: I spotted red light while sitting in my back yard.I knew right away it was unusual.I watched it for a few minutes then ran inside to tell my mother to come out and see it.She said she did't know what it could be.The weather was chilly so she went back inside.I stayed and watched it for for another 15 minutes.The light was perfectly stationary except for the last 3 or 4 seconds when it started blinking and dropped down a little and then disappeared.The light was fairly high in altitude because a patch of mid-level clouds passed in front of it for a couple of minutes. i looked at it through my binoculars but could'nt see any details .About an hour later i saw the same or a similar light in the same spot.It was not moving.I watched it for approx.30 seconds and ran back inside to get my binoculars again.When i went back outside the light was gone.I called a local tv station to report what i had seen.I was told that they had received other calls about the red light.
content.summary: Stationary red light approx. 35 degrees above eastern horizon

content.detailedDescription:
I am an instructor for the us army on ft huachuca, arizona. part of my duties requires me to travel to middle garden canyon trail on ft huachuca. on one of these excursions i was sitting on a post and just happened to look up and noticed this silver and white object lingering above the mountains. i initially thought it was a weather balloon as it was during the monsoon season. i watched this thing float in the air for probably 45 minutes to an hour. during the time i was watching this the object seemed to ascend and descend in altitude. now the whole time i'm veiwing this object it seemed to either reflect the sunlight or flash a light almost as if it were spinning and only one side was silver or really shiny. in my best estimate it was probably somewhere around 15,000 to 25,000 feet in the air. to cover this object at an arms length you would probably have to use the cap of a bic pen. it moved off towards mexico as it ascended and descend in altitude. a co-worker radioed this into one of the military instructors at our base camp and he reported it to the border patrol but they informed him it was one of thier balloons. i am not an expert or even heard of baloons being controlled. now i usually bring my camera but unfortunately this trip i had left the camera at home. now also during this time there weren't very many clouds in the sky, and the ones that were weren't in the same area as this object. i wish i would have known about this website and your organization at the time of the incident then i would have been able to give more details. if you wish i can take you to the area i witnessed this object. you will have to have a suv as you can't take a sedan to this area.
after witnessing this object for about 15 minutes i myself determined it to be a ufo. most of my co-workers heard teh call across the radio and when we were all gathered together i was harrassed a little bit. i lost sight of the object as due to work requirements i had to move up the mountain. at the same time i would say the object ascended to between 25,000 and 30,000 feet off towards mexico.
content.summary: A silver and white cylinder object ascending and descending in altitude between 15k-25k in southern arizona.

content.detailedDescription: A black triangular object with a light in each corner of it was above the walmart store in kokomo indiana at approximately 9:04 pm.  the lights were red, green, and some sort of color prism emitting white with blue strobing hues.  there was no sound from my perspective.  the object was traveling slowly moving north-northwest.  it was a very clear night with many small airplanes in the vicinity during this time.  many stars were visible also.  witnesses, three, myself, daughter, and mother.  i reported this via phone on the same night (sept. 27th) to glen means from indiana mufon.  i did not watch the object leave the skyway as i entered the walmart to shop.  no one else seemed to be looking upward towards the sky.  the object definitely had a triangular shape and it had mass to it.  i could not see stars or sky on the other side of the object...The triangle was all black, and could not see thru it at all.  my daughter( who has 20/15 vision) said she could see "squiggly lines underneath the object.
content.summary: Black triangle

content.detailedDescription: We lived on a air force base in 1991. my daughter then 10 and my son 4 went out to play in the back yard with friends. i was washing dishes, when i had an overwhelming feeling to go check on my kids. i went out and my daughter said that she saw a ufo. the other kids were excited as well. my daughter said to look up and all i saw was a golden streak go into the clouds.  my daughter said that it looked like a diamond with a wheel going around it.
content.summary: Diamond shape ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a walk outside of my parents house and i happened to look up and saw it.  it was still light outside and it was a large triangle shaped.  it had no lights on it just large, grey type metal, and very close to the ground, like a low air plane.  i didn't know what it was so i just kept staring at it expecting it to disappear because i was imaginaging it. i kept thinking it can't be real because it is so silent.  it made no sound at all.  it just sat there, it wasn't even hovering, just sitting in the sky.  then after about a minute and a half it took off. it went faster than anything that i have ever seen and it still made no sound.  it went much faster than any airplane that i have ever seen.  it disappeared over the horizon and i just sat on the ground and stared at where it had disappeared.  i sat there until it got dark wondering if it would come back, eventually i went back to the house and no one believed me.
content.summary: Silent, just sat in the air and for about a minute and a half then took off very fast

content.detailedDescription: I was living in golden colorado in 1974.  i lived in a second story apt. one night i woke up and it was so cold. the power was out. i got my baby from his room and wrapped him in his blanket.  i could not go back to sleep.  i stood at my window and looked out at the canyons of the rocky mts.  all of a sudden i noticed a ufo hoving and moving slowly towards the canyons. it was right above the apt complex, but moving away into the mts.It was box shape. it looked dark. it had alot of lights under it. i watched it go into the canyons. then it was gone.
content.summary: Ufo  in the rockies

content.detailedDescription: It was the summer of 1972. on niagra st. navy housing, newport r.I. i was sitting on the stairs in front of my house with a group of friends. there were alot of people sitting outside their stairs on that cool night around 7:00 pm.  i looked up and so did everyone else on that street.  there was a ufo just flying slowly right down the middle of the street. about  80 feet up. i ran in the house to get my mother. she came outside and said i believe in ufos but not little green men.  my brother and i chased after it.  it stopped and then a flame shot out from under.  it went straight up. it was round and gray, with two longated windows. it had an entena on top.
content.summary: Ufo flying slowly down the street.

content.detailedDescription:
This was a breaking point. i was the guy who reported the st charles sightings and talked a little stupid. 

anyways i love mufon sight so ill share this was so cool.

to be honest i was at a farm ranch in dixon , home of ronald regan for a dui weekend getaway. so having seen shooting stars numerous times and funny lights moving slowly for a long time i decided to wander off after the rest of the bunch went to bed.

so i took a walk on the farm ranch and it appeared the entire sky started following me and this white bright light i see nightly over our house in st charles blinked on and off multiple times as if it knew i was watching the skies for it.

so being a fool like i am and acting like moses i screamed out loud in a way and said "come pick me up yeshua , come shu come eset, im not afraid" deep in the middle of a deserted ranch by myself.

so then i said show me a sign at least , that guy in arizona gets to see the full show on a regular basis. and this amazing thing happening.

this neon blue thing swooped down like the size of 3 football fields at like 10 times the speed of any plane ive ever seen. it was amazing so i spent until 4 am trying to get abducted and obviously it never happened.

i dont pray or go to church.

love jolly roger
content.summary: I promised myself i wouldnt report this

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car coming back from the mall and my eye got caught by a bright light.  my eyes focused on it.  it was a saturn-like object with a bright yellow light in the middle of the rings.  there were two blinking lights around it.  the object stayed up for about one minute and then zoomed away.  while the object was in the air, everything was silent.
content.summary: Saturn like with lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting this as was told to me.

a man and his wife have been seeing some strange objects in the sky between 8 and 8:30 for the past few weeks. during the indicated time frame, he reported seeing a star-like object in the southwest. he presumed it to be a planet or star until he noticed the object flashed colors of red and green. he viewed the object with the usage of binoculars, but was unable to obtain a decent image on account of not having a tripod and the human tendency to not be perfectly still. however, the object still flashes the colors of green and red. since the first episode, he has viewed up to five of these objects in the sky simultaneously - one lies in the west, one in the southwest, one in the south, one in the north, and one in the northeast. according to him, all of these objects are brighter than the normal "stars" he views in the night (he has been observing the night sky for a number of years). 

he mentioned the one in the southwest had two objects either going around it or the two objects were stationary but equidistant from the main point source object, and these two objects were also flashing green and red. 

the objects appear to be between 20 and 30 degrees above the horizon and they sink below the horizon as time progresses.

he has contacted several friends and relatives about the event, and though they might not see the same total number, all of them have reported seeing the objects and the flashing colors. 

again, he first thought they were planets or stars, but after seeing the flashing colors of red and green, he suspected the objects were something else, but he doesn't know what.
content.summary: 5 star-like objects were apparent in the night sky between 8 and 8:30 over the past few weeks

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were driving towards graham, tx, on hwy 380 about 3 miles out of graham proper.  i am an avid night sky watcher so when i noticed an extremely bright star/planet about 40��� above the horizon to the northwest, i was surprised.  i indicated it to my son and told him that's got to be a planet because of the brightness, but i'd never remembered seeing such a bright light in that part of the sky at this time of the year.  as we got into graham and stopped for gas (about 4 minutes from first sighting it) i noticed that the light had turned pink/red as it would do if it were getting lower to the horizon and atmospherics colored it a bit.  about two minutes after that it vanished and unless it's the fastest planet in the solar system i don't know what it could have been.  i've just now used an interactive sky chart and there is nothing there that could have explained it (note: constellation lynx is close to where it was).  there was no obvious movement, just the rapid color changes and the apparent disappearance of the object/star/planet.  end of report.
content.summary: Looked like an extremely bright star/planet, white going to red

content.detailedDescription:
Looking west at lake michigan.  approximately 9:40 p.M.  object with red and green flashing lights seen in the distance.  object was too low to be a star and since it hovered for almost 40 minutes, it couldn't be a plane.  used binoculars to see the object, which appeared circular.  the red and green lights continuously flashed.  at one point, a bright white light flashed in the sky near the aircraft.

aircraft hovered in the same position for about 40 minutes, eventually moving south toward the lake, then disappearing.  seemed to be hovering over the water, not over land.
content.summary: Red and green flashing lights on hovering aircraft; short, bright light accompanied aircraft sighting

content.detailedDescription:
Sept 18, 2008 8:48 p.M. at home in my backyard as usual i was taking time lapse pictures of planes, jets, stars and jupiter with a clear night sky. 

i use a remote cord attached to my nikon d80 digital camera, mounted on a tripod. set on manual focus, iso 400 fine, on bulb at f4.5. (usually)
my lens is a dx af-s nikkor 18-135 mm.

to preset my camera focus i use jupiter because it is small and bright. 
i can see jupiter with its moons when i zoom in on my image. 

of course with time lapse every visible star draws a line due to the rotation of the earth. planes and jets with their flashing lights will track lines and flash points. some very interesting array of patterns can be pictured this way.

whenever i spot a dull or bright star like object moving slowly across the night sky i immediately turn my preset focused camera, frame and shoot using time lapse photography. these star like objects always move slowly in a straight line and fade out or sometimes i have seen them also appear into view and fade out again or just sit still and disappear. most sightings last 5 to 6 seconds but no more than 30 perhaps.  

attached picture for sept 18, 2008 8:48 p.M. at home in my backyard.

i saw a large white star like object moving slowly in a straight line. 
immediately i turned my preset focused camera, framed and opened my shutter  using my time lapse while i watched the light progressively getting fainter until it vanished to the naked eye, which lasted about 10 seconds from the time i had noticed it. i am not sure but i think i left the aperture open for 12 to 15 seconds.

unfortunately i framed this star like object a little too low moving out of my picture area before it faded away.

after i took the picture i zoomed in on that portion of the black sky littered with stars, to see what looks like the very faint object spiraling, creating a weird corkscrew path that diminished in diameter. i think it's a bit out of focus too. i have no idea how high or how large this spinning object was moving.

i have on other nights photographed such star like objects as well but this one is  probably the most dramatic picture i have taken so far.

my feelings are mixed.
 
the cosmos has endless possibilities for any form of life, consciousness, technology and science that can only provoke more questions than concrete answers. 

to witness moments like mine are awesome. i wish is to spread the word to other star gazers with better camera lenses and video cameras so that we can capture better images than mine. perhaps this method may shed some light about their propulsion systems.

i think the corkscrew turning indicates a certain flying method in entry or exit from earths sky's. who knows what stealth or wonders man made or alien may exist. maybe it is just a common unnoticed phenomenon in nature. 

david sereda, 
i believe has talked about the "galaxy clock" 
"electromagnetic wave patterns vibrating so fast within a space that they give the illusion that mass is solid. 
because of this dichotmoy, mass is believed to be both made of particles and waves. 
particle and wave theory are fusing together as they are both revealing the same thing. all mass has waves that vibrate at different frequencies."

i hope to receive an experts opinion as to what i've photographed. i will accept any answer other than a hoax.
content.summary: Time lapse photography of a bright star like object moving slowly and progressively getting fainter until it vanished.

content.detailedDescription: We were docked in the gulf canal one-half mile ne of tapper bridge enjoying the scenery, brilliant blue skies with a few wispy high (cirrus) clouds at approximately 3:30 pm edt.  at approximately 3:40 edt, i witnessed an aerial object at cloud height approach my line of sight from the se heading nw.  the object appeared to be a silvery-white color.  the object was rather unusual because no wings could be detected, nor was there any sound associated.  the object resembled a blimp in shape, cigar-shaped more or less and was moving at a steady speed.  the object disappeared into one of the thicker cirrus clouds and did not reappear.  sighting lasted approximately 70 seconds.
content.summary: Silver / white cigar-shaped craft cloud height

content.detailedDescription: While flying in a freighter with two other crew members i spotted a very large aircraft displaying four very bright lights, but quickly realized was not not any known aircraft type. i did report this to an organization in canada years later but never heard back from anyone. i'm a retired pan am pilot.
content.summary: Unknown aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a highschool football game up on top of the press box filming the game for the head coach. it was cool out around 74deg i was looking e, ese maybe. the game started at 7:30pm. it was still in the 1st quarter so i guess the time was about 8:15pm. i was filming each play and then stoping the camera. as i stoped the camera i saw what i at first thought was a rocket like a fireworks rocket it had a tail and a bright spot at the front i watched it for about 3 sec then it just winked out i was kind of waitihg for a pop sound thinking it was a fireworks but i did not here one. the more i thought about it the more it just did not add up.
1. i was below the field lights as bright as they were i should not have been able to see it that clearly.
2. it made no sound now the field pa was on and the crowd was loud so this may not apply.
3. it flew stright not in a arc.
4.It looked bright and soild it was just as bright at the tail as the tip.
i dont know what it was and i'm only reporting this so if someone else got a better look you have another source to say yes there was something there.
if someone else did see something please let me know what thay saw.If you have any questions feel free to call the  provided after 7 pm est
 thank you
content.summary: I was on top of a press box filming a football game when i saw a bright object fly over.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and two friends were walking within eugene's limits from one of our houses to another in a residential neighborhood. as we were talking, one buddy pointed ahead at two orange "dots/stars", in the sky. one was higher than the other and to it's right and both were moving slowly. the lower was moving to the right and the higher was moving down and to the left, towards the lower one. they had no blinking lights like a plane would, which is what caught our eyes... that and their bright orange color, as opposed to the stars we saw that were light yellow/white. they were both about the size of a large star and were shimmering a little. as the upper one came closer to the lower, they both began to accelerate (the upper one more so) and as they crossed each other's paths, the lower one "dropped" quickly toward the ground, as if it were "falling", dimmed on and off a little, then vanished. the upper one remained for about another three to five minutes, began to "drip" small orange lights, that were very faint and vanished like sparks cooling as they fall from being belched up from a campfire, then the large dot began to dim a little on and off like the other large one had, then it vanished. we had no idea what they could have been, and weren't very talkative about them after the incident was over. while we were watching them, we talked about them and whatever it was we were discussing at the time (small talk/forget what) about 66/34 percent of the time. it wasn't until they accelerated and passed each other that we became a little excited and as the one "fell" we walked a little faster to get past a street light we were approaching so we could see what it did as it neared the horizon. as the last one 'dripped', we were basically saying, "what the *bleep* could those possibly be?"
content.summary: 2 orange balls moved closer to each other, intersected and one dropped fast and disappeared then other "dripped" small ones and vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
Well where should i start this is not the first time we have seen these things but is the first time i have reported it.

me and my girlfreind desided to go outside for a cig because we dont smoke in the house.
we were out for about 5 minuites before spotting a star like object comeing towards us from the west we knew it was nothing any human would have made because of the way it moved from side to side as it was makeing its path accross the sky the object tended to pulse in brightness the more it speeded up.

there was no engine noise for this object it was silent as it flew overhead and carried on towards the east aventually vanishing behind the trees out of veiw.

this is the 3rd sighting of exactly the same object my girlfreind could not beleive what she was seeing again as she has seen the other 2 siteing too.
it was a very awsome site still exited about it while posting this report.

i did try to record the site with my girlfreinds sony erricson w850i but the camera was rubbish and just saw darkness i am now going to buy a night vision camera to start a sky watch to try catch these on camera and finally have proof.
content.summary: Ufo bright orb moveing from west to east

content.detailedDescription: What was found tonight on september 28th,2008 was a picture of 2 ufos that were taken by me and my brother.We were riding bikes around and decided to take a random picture.Since the screen on the camera was broken we couldn't really see what was on the picture until we got home.When we got home we uploaded the picture to the computer with our sanyo 6.0 megapixel camera.At first when we looked at this picture we thought it was a moon and some other tower or something.But at a closer look it looked like a moon and a ufo.The shape on the left had nothing connecting it to anything so therefore it wasnt a tower that we know of.Me and my dad drove around looking for a moon too but found nothing,so possibly 2 ufos.
content.summary: Took a picture not knowing there was a object

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were riding bikes and i decided to take a picture to make sure the camera was working.So i took a picture and when we got home we put the picture onto the computer to look at it because the screen on the camera doesnt work anymore.So when we looked at it at first i thought it was 2 moons or something but it wasnt.Then i looked and one looked saucer shaped and the other looked like the moon.So then me and my dad went up to that area and looked around for the moon in the object and saw neither.So i think that both may have been a u.F.O
content.summary: Spotted the objects in a camera picture my son took.

content.summary: Spotted the objects in a camera picture my son took.

content.detailedDescription: Ok,this the 2nd time we have seen this (in the last month)in the western sky. a circular shape which seems to spin from a ful cirlce then it looks elongated. when it is the full circle shape it resembles a ferris wheel wth all of the lights blinking. these lights seems to be white, red & blue. it stays in the sae locatio for up to 2 hours then fades...Could this e a statelite??
content.summary: 2 nd  time rotating circular shape with blinking lights

content.detailedDescription:
Sort of like aerodynamic long body with wings. really big and got wide at the end. it was dark and this was a silhouette they were seeing. the lights were the most interesting part of the object. knew it wasn't a plane has a single light non flashing the lights on this object were all over and covered the entire craft instead of flashing at a constant rate therre were many rates all different colors erradically and quickly looked sparkling. dj friend got a video on phone poor quality.   the lights changed orange green red blue yellow.

in lakewood hanging out at friends house. early morn walk. hadln't planned on going to lake. past park while walking down the road right on lake side. park area with picnic area and trees. hill , slopes down 30 deg. to lake. path and then cliff. at the blottom of cliff was a beach.  stopped aton path and had a weird feeling. like some psychic thing. she had to go down to beach. there was a hidden area. there was animal and plant debris and saw pagan ritual stuff. had sacrificed some osrt of animal.  checked out for 15 minutes. put meteor in pocket. walking slow and turned around. beach on right side trcleveland behind her sun just starting to come up behind cleveland. walking back up saw real bright light from south and flying low. dj and her were looking at it. they watched it going from left to right. siilent. feels it was connected to pagan stuff they saw. there was a sun dial pointed at north star. the ufo flew in direction thing was ointing. it changed directions had erradic movement. then it blasted off fast towardsnorth. another came up from behind. same type.And flew off in same direction. saw a bouy or bigship in the distance. hovering around ship.. it landed on water and 30 seconds later 2 lights popped out from where it came from. 2 separate things flying in formation. flew into the direction of north star and disappeared. from the time seen to disappear it was like 10 minutes aor more.

meteor-not sure what it was. friend suggested that's what it might be. she's pretty sure. she put it back where she found it and does not have it. plus 4 other little pieces. not a rock she says.  it was in a crafter.  looked as though they built ceremony around meteor.
content.summary: Sighting over lake erie at edgepark

content.detailedDescription: I normally would be skeptic of the stories that i would hear about seeing ufo's, but that night i'm pretty sure that i became a believer. it was was the night of september 26th 2008 at some where around the time of 11:15pm.I remember that the sky was the equivalent of being a beach with no lights around you, while the sky was crystal clear(not a cloud in the sky. i thought it was kind of weird because we hardly ever get nights like that here in my city. i was letting my dog outside to use the bathroom, when i just so happen to look up at the sky like i do every night to look at the stars. flying right over head at the exact time i looked up was what i thought looked like birds flying in v-formation at first glance. but quickly realized that there was something wrong with how fast they were flying and how it looked. the duration of what i was was pretty brief and lasted with direct flight for about 6-10 seconds max in my field of view. if i had to guess how far up above me it was i would have to say around 15,000 feet or close to it. there were 5 lights that had one in front leading with two on each opposing side forming off to make a "v" in the sky, and never once broke formation(which makes me think that they were part of something way bigger than just these lights i saw). now this part is really going to sound really strange and i have a hard time believing it myself but... the lights were not bright at all....As a matter of fact...It had the same effect to them as when you see on movies and a spaceship has a cloaking device activated. it was that effect that made me at first think that it was birds flying until a kept observing it. if was flying from north-west to east, and i followed it with eyes from first sight til i lost sight of it continuing east over a tree line. what i saw, was not accompanied with any sound what so ever(for the height flew over), no flashing lights, and no distinguishable shape except for the "v" formation that it was in. i still can't get what i saw out of my head, nor can i wrap my brain around it. and the fact the it looked somewhat cloaked was just something i could not believe right out of a movies. and it moved pretty rapidly and very steady across the sky. i don't know what i saw, but i can guarantee that it wasn't a flock of birds, and definitely not and airplane.! i attempted to use photoshop to try and recreate what i saw, although its to give a rough idea as to how wild it was, i wanted to trt and show you what the cloak effect kinda looked like.
content.summary: Ufo desguised as a flock of birds passing at night!
